name: portfolio-website
description: Professional portfolio website with payment processing

scripts.build: echo 'Static site - no build step required'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run security-check
scripts.security-scan: npm run security-check && echo 'Security scan completed'
scripts.validate-env: node -e "const required = ['STRIPE_SECRET_KEY', 'STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY']; required.forEach(key => { if (!process.env[key]) { console.error('Missing required env var:', key); process.exit(1); } }); console.log('Environment validation passed');"
